Text: It works great! Thank's a lot!!!

The installer contained a trojan which let in a really weak attempt at a regenerating version of "Total Security 2009" rogue antispyware.

Chumped it by easily resetting all default values to zero in the script, and rerouting the HKMachine key to point to itself instead of startup.  

Easily trashed and all other files wiped clean manually in about 10 mins.

Scan your file and re-upload please- the game itself is fine once scrubbed.
